meanings.definition: ニヴェルネーズ風の（料理）
meanings.english_definition: (of food) prepared or served in the style of the Nivernais region of France, typically with carrots and onions.

examples.translation: 牛肉のニヴェルネーズ風
examples.note: 牛肉をニンジンとタマネギで煮込んだ料理

meanings.definition: ニヴェルネーズ風（料理）
meanings.english_definition: A dish prepared in the style of the Nivernais region of France, typically with carrots and onions.

etymology.value: From the Nivernais region of France.
